ERROR_MESSAGE.INVALID_DATE_RANGE: Invalid date range! make sure your range must be valid and cannot be more than ${allowedRange} days
ERROR_MESSAGE.NO_DATE_RANGE: Invalid date range! the date range cannot be a null value
ERROR_MESSAGE.INVALID_DATA_SOURCE: limits for datasource does not exist!

DATASET.CREATED: The data has been successfully ingested

CONFIG.DATASET_SAVED: The dataset configuration has been saved successfully
CONFIG.DATASET_UPDATED: The dataset configuration has been updated successfully
CONFIG.DATASOURCE_SAVED: The datasource configuration has been saved successfully
CONFIG.DATASOURCE_UPDATED: The datasource configuration has been updated successfully
CONFIG.DATASET_PUBLISHED: The dataset configuration has been published successfully
CONFIG.DATASOURCE_PUBLISHED: The datasource configuration has been published successfully
CONFIG.DATASET_RETIRED: The dataset configuration has been retired successfully

DATASET_ID_NOT_FOUND.message: Dataset Id not found, Failed to ingest

EMPTY_DATASET_ID.message: datasetId parameter in url cannot be empty

INVALID_DATASET_CONFIG.message: Invalid dataset config provided for ingestion

RECORD_SAVED: The Record has been saved successfully
RECORD_UPDATED: The Record has been update successfully

TABLE_NOT_FOUND.message: Table does not exist in database

EXHAUST.NO_BACKUP_FILES: Date range provided does not have any backup files

INVALID_DATASOURCE_REF.message: Datasource ref must match ingestion spec datasource

INVALID_TOPIC.message: topic name in ingestion spec must match dataset id

DATASET_NOT_FOUND.message: Dataset id does not exist in database

DUPLICATE_DENORM_FIELD.message: Duplicate found for denorm output key

INGESTION_SUBMITTED: ingestion spec has been submitted successfully
INGESTION_FAILED_ON_SAVE: Failed to submit Ingestion Spec, record is not saved
